ygData.msgSnippet: ... Also Bellow will always interrupt a PC casting and it is much harder to resist then Pixie Strike.  I was able to bellow and interrupt a 44th lvl wizard at
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: "'eqbards@onelist.com'" <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] UPDATE Bards vs Clerics in melee (Long)
>Date: Wed, 29 Sep 1999 11:11:40 -0400
>
>From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>in relation to a previous discussion about Pixie Strike working on PCs, boy
>does it work incredibly. his high dmg DD spells take a long time to cast,

Also Bellow will always interrupt a PC casting and it is much harder to
resist then Pixie Strike. I was able to bellow and interrupt a 44th lvl
wizard at 32nd lvl with it every time :)

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Craftsmen of Societus Argenti
